verses.verse: וַֽיִּקְרְב֞וּ <WH7126> came near רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> And the chief הָֽאָב֗וֹת <WH1> fathers לְמִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <WH4940> of the families בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children גִלְעָד֙ <WH1568> of Gilead בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מָכִ֣יר <WH4353> of Machir בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh מִֽמִּשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <WH4940> of the families בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> of Joseph וַֽיְדַבְּר֞וּ <WH1696> and spake לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> Moses וְלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> and before הַנְּשִׂאִ֔ים <WH5387> the princes רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> the chief אָב֖וֹת <WH1> fathers לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> And they said אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנִי֙ <WH113> my lord צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD לָתֵ֨ת <WH5414> to give אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֧רֶץ <WH776> the land בְּנַחֲלָ֛ה <WH5159> for an inheritance בְּגוֹרָ֖ל <WH1486> by lot לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַֽאדֹנִי֙ <WH113> and my lord צֻוָּ֣ה <WH6680> was commanded בַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> by the LORD לָתֵ֗ת <WH5414> to give אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַחֲלַ֛ת <WH5159> the inheritance צְלָפְחָ֥ד <WH6765> of Zelophehad אָחִ֖ינוּ <WH251> our brother לִבְנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1323> unto his daughters

וְ֠הָיוּ <WH1961> belong לְאֶחָ֞ד <WH259> to any מִבְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> of the sons שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> of the [other] tribes בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel לְנָשִׁים֒ <WH802> And if they be married וְנִגְרְעָ֤ה <WH1639> be taken נַחֲלָתָן֙ <WH5159> then shall their inheritance מִנַּחֲלַ֣ת <WH5159> from the inheritance אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH1> of our fathers וְנוֹסַ֕ף <WH3254> and shall be put עַ֚ל <WH5921> unto נַחֲלַ֣ת <WH5159> to the inheritance הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <WH4294> of the tribe אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> to which תִּהְיֶ֖ינָה <WH1961> belong לָהֶ֑ם וּמִגֹּרַ֥ל <WH1486> from the lot נַחֲלָתֵ֖נוּ <WH5159> of our inheritance יִגָּרֵֽעַ׃ <WH1639> whereunto they are received so shall it be taken

וְאִם־ <WH518> When יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> comes הַיֹּבֵל֮ <WH3104> And when the jubile לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel וְנֽוֹסְפָה֙ <WH3254> be put נַחֲלָתָ֔ן <WH5159> shall be then shall their inheritance עַ֚ל <WH5921> unto נַחֲלַ֣ת <WH5159> unto the inheritance הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <WH4294> of the tribe אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> to which תִּהְיֶ֖ינָה <WH1961> belong לָהֶ֑ם וּמִֽנַּחֲלַת֙ <WH5159> whereunto they are received so shall their inheritance מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of the tribe אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH1> of our fathers יִגָּרַ֖ע <WH1639> be taken away נַחֲלָתָֽן׃ <WH5159> from the inheritance

וַיְצַ֤ו <WH6680> commanded מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֥י <WH6310> according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> The tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the sons יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> of Joseph דֹּבְרִֽים׃ <WH1696> hath said

זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֞ר <WH1697> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> doth command יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> which the LORD לִבְנ֤וֹת <WH1323> concerning the daughters צְלָפְחָד֙ <WH6765> of Zelophehad לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לַטּ֥וֹב <WH2896> best בְּעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5869> to whom they think תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <WH1961> become לְנָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> Let them marry אַ֗ךְ <WH389> only לְמִשְׁפַּ֛חַת <WH4940> only to the family מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <WH1> of their father תִּהְיֶ֥ינָה <WH1961> shall they לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <WH802> shall they marry

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תִסֹּ֤ב <WH5437> remove נַחֲלָה֙ <WH5159> So shall not the inheritance לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מִמַּטֶּ֖ה <WH4294> from tribe אֶל־ <WH413> to מַטֶּ֑ה <WH4294> to tribe כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> for every one בְּנַחֲלַת֙ <WH5159> himself to the inheritance מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> of the tribe אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> of his fathers יִדְבְּק֖וּ <WH1692> shall keep בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְכָל־ <WH3605> Every בַּ֞ת <WH1323> And every daughter יֹרֶ֣שֶׁת <WH3423> that possesseth נַחֲלָ֗ה <WH5159> an inheritance מִמַּטּוֹת֮ <WH4294> in any tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel לְאֶחָ֗ד <WH259> unto one מִמִּשְׁפַּ֛חַת <WH4940> of the family מַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe אָבִ֖יהָ <WH1> of her father תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> shall be wife לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> so יִֽירְשׁוּ֙ <WH3423> may enjoy בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> the inheritance אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1> of his fathers

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תִסֹּ֧ב <WH5437> remove נַחֲלָ֛ה <WH5159> Neither shall the inheritance מִמַּטֶּ֖ה <WH4294> from [one] tribe לְמַטֶּ֣ה <WH4294> tribe אַחֵ֑ר <WH312> to another כִּי־ <WH3588> for אִישׁ֙ <WH376> but every one בְּנַ֣חֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> himself to his own inheritance יִדְבְּק֕וּ <WH1692> shall keep מַטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> of the tribes בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> Moses כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> so did בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> the daughters צְלָפְחָֽד׃ <WH6765> of Zelophehad

וַתִּהְיֶ֜ינָה <WH1961> become מַחְלָ֣ה <WH4244> For Mahlah תִרְצָ֗ה <WH8656> Tirzah וְחָגְלָ֧ה <WH2295> and Hoglah וּמִלְכָּ֛ה <WH4435> and Milcah וְנֹעָ֖ה <WH5270> and Noah בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> the daughters צְלָפְחָ֑ד <WH6765> of Zelophehad לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> brothers' sons דֹדֵיהֶ֖ן <WH1730> unto their father's לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <WH802> were married

מִֽמִּשְׁפְּחֹ֛ת <WH4940> into the families בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the sons מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH4519> of Manasseh בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> of Joseph הָי֣וּ <WH1961> remained לְנָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> [And] they were married וַתְּהִי֙ <WH1961> remained נַחֲלָתָ֔ן <WH5159> and their inheritance עַל־ <WH5921> with מַטֵּ֖ה <WH4294> remained in the tribe מִשְׁפַּ֥חַת <WH4940> of the family אֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <WH1> of their father

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These הַמִּצְוֹ֞ת <WH4687> These [are] the commandments וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <WH4941> and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> of Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <WH6160> in the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab עַ֖ל <WH5921> by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> by Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> [near] Jericho
